revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Ubiquiti Networks Rocket M2 Titanium]] to [[Ubiquiti Networks Rocket M2 Titanium (RM2-Ti)]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=Rocket |revision=M2 Titanium (RM2-Ti) |asin= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability= |fcc_date=08/13/2009 |fcc_id=SWX-M2 |ic_id=6545A-M2 |pcb_id= |type=access point |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7370 |cpu1_cspeed=550 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64CVF1G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283;AR9283-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |sw_cpu= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=outdoor |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;;AirOS; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.20 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui=DC:9F:DB |oui_eth=DC:9F:DB }} :[http://dl.ubnt.com/datasheets/bulletm/BulletM_Ti_DS.pdf Datasheet for the ''M-series Bullets'']
"ROCKET 2T Ubiquiti Network 2012" is silkscreened on the board. :ttyCOM place for GPS, but not support on default in firmware.
There is an ''[[Atheros]]'' AR7370 inside the device. .. but it is fully program :compatible with AR9344, and it shows it in the processor data.
*[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/wd/rext It would seem to be another '''Wasp'''-series SoC], perhaps :w/ Wi-Fi capability (and maybe the FE switch) omitted.
The FCC docs for this device are not exceedingly useful :- the internal photos are perma-confidential.
